citations.narrative:
An enclosure housing four adult huskies has sharp points on the door. The braided wire fence door has a hole at
approximately eye level of the dogs. The hole was repaired with a portion of galvanized fence panel that has sharp points
present. Additionally, the door has one strand of barbed wire along the top. Primary enclosures that contain sharp points
can subject the animals to injury. Correct by ensuring that primary enclosures are constructed and maintained in a way
that they have no sharp points or edges that could injure the dogs. Correct by 22-December-2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
An enclosure housing four adult huskies has sharp points on the door. The braided wire fence door has a hole at 
approximately eye level of the dogs. The hole was repaired with a portion of galvanized fence panel that has sharp points 
present. Additionally, the door has one strand of barbed wire along the top. Primary enclosures that contain sharp points 
can subject the animals to injury. Correct by ensuring that primary enclosures are constructed and maintained in a way 
that they have no sharp points or edges that could injure the dogs. Correct by 22-December-2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
